Package org.rcmd.jneuroformats

Class Mz3

java.lang.Object
org.rcmd.jneuroformats.Mz3
public class Mz3 extends Object
Class representing a MZ3 surface file.

      perVertexData - per-vertex data, one value per vertex.
      vertexColors - per-vertex colors, one color per vertex.

  • Method Details

    • fromMz3File

      public static Mz3 fromMz3File(Path filePath) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException, BufferUnderflowException
      Read a file in MZ3 surface format and return an FsSurface object.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the name of the file to read, as a Path object. Get on from a string by something like `java.nio.file.Paths.Path.get("myfile.mz3")`.
      Returns:
      an FsSurface object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - if file not found.
      BufferUnderflowException - if buffer underflow occurs, i.e., the file is too short to read the first header part required to determine the file format.

    • mz3FileIsGzipped

      protected static Boolean mz3FileIsGzipped(Path filePath) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException, BufferUnderflowException
      Check whether a MZ3 file is gzipped.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file
      Returns:
      true if the file is gzipped, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - if file not found.
      BufferUnderflowException - if buffer underflow occurs, i.e., the file is too short to read the first header part required to determine the file format.
